articles.description: The highly anticipated strategy RPG game Crusader Kings III has just received a September release date, as well as confirmation that it will join Xbox Game Pass for PC as a day one addition.
articles.content: The much-anticipated strategy RPG Crusader Kings III will join Xbox Game Pass for PC as a day one addition when the game is released on September 1st for Windows.Crusader Kings III is set in the Middle Ages. The Xbox wire post explains how you'll be guiding "… [+2237 chars]

articles.title: PS5 Is Still Set To Release This Year - GameSpot
articles.description: Despite the ongoing issues with COVID-19, Sony believes it will still launch its next-generation PlayStation 5 console this year.
articles.content: In its latest financial earnings presentation, Sony has explained that its hardware and software plans for the upcoming PlayStation 5 launch have been unaffected by the global COVID-19 pandemic. Sony has still not yet announced a specific PS5 release date, bu… [+2225 chars]
